action.content: Turn 0

You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Write your plan for your next actions on the line below your action, starting with "Next actions:".
For example:
> open cupboard
Next actions: take orange, eat orange

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the potted plant in the freezer, the plate on the table and the mop in the refrigerator.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a bedroom now. There are a bed and a wardrobe. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a hallway here.

> open wardrobe

Next actions: check wardrobe contents, take potted plant
Turn 1
The wardrobe is now open. In the wardrobe there is a pillow.

> take potted plant

Next actions: go to hallway, check hallway for possible destinations
Turn 2
You can't see a potted plant here.

> search wardrobe

Next actions: take potted plant, go to hallway
Turn 3
There is a pillow in the wardrobe. The wardrobe is openable and currently open.

> search wardrobe again

Next actions: take potted plant, go to hallway
Turn 4
I don't know what 'wardrobe again' means.

> search wardrobe

Next actions: take potted plant, go to hallway
Turn 5
There is a pillow in the wardrobe. The wardrobe is openable and currently open.

> take pillow

Next actions: put pillow back, search wardrobe
Turn 6
You take the pillow. In your inventory you have a pillow.

> search wardrobe

Next actions: take potted plant, go to hallway
Turn 7
The wardrobe is empty. The wardrobe is openable and currently open.

> close wardrobe

Next actions: go to hallway, search hallway
Turn 8
The wardrobe is now closed.

> go to hallway

Next actions: search hallway, find potted plant
Turn 9
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a bedroom, a living room, a broom closet and a kitchen here.

> take potted plant

Next actions: go to kitchen, put potted plant in freezer
Turn 10
You take the potted plant. In your inventory you have a pillow and a potted plant.

> go to kitchen

Next actions: put potted plant in freezer, check kitchen for plate
Turn 11
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a pantry, a living room and a hallway here.

> open cupboard

Next actions: take plate, put potted plant in freezer
Turn 12
The cupboard is now open. In the cupboard there is a plate.

> take plate

Next actions: put plate on table, put potted plant in freezer
Turn 13
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.

> put potted plant in freezer

Next actions: put plate on table, go to cupboard to take mop
Turn 14
You can't see a freezer here.

> go to hallway

Next actions: go to living room, find table, put plate on table
Turn 15
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a bedroom, a living room, a broom closet and a kitchen here.

> go to living room

Next actions: find table, put plate on table
Turn 16
You are in a living room now. There are a shelf, a couch, a table, a chair, a side table and a book. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a kitchen and a hallway here.

> put plate on table

Next actions: go to kitchen, find mop
Turn 17
You can't see a plate here.

> go to kitchen

Next actions: take mop, put potted plant in freezer
Turn 18
You are in a kitchen now. There are a plate, a cupboard and a counter. The plate is in the cupboard. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a pantry, a living room and a hallway here.

> take mop

Next actions: put mop in refrigerator, put potted plant in freezer
Turn 19
You can't see a mop here.

> go to broom closet

Next actions: take mop, put mop in refrigerator
Turn 20
You can't go to a broom closet from here.

> go to hallway

Next actions: go to broom closet, take mop
Turn 21
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a bedroom, a living room, a broom closet and a kitchen here.

> go to broom closet

Next actions: take mop, put mop in refrigerator
Turn 22
You are in a broom closet now. There are a broom and a mop. The broom is on the floor. The mop is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.

> take mop

Next actions: go to kitchen, put mop in refrigerator
Turn 23
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.

> put potted plant in hallway

Next actions: take mop, go to kitchen
Turn 24
You are not in a hallway.

> go to hallway

Next actions: take mop, go to kitchen
Turn 25
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a bedroom, a living room, a broom closet and a kitchen here.

> go to broom closet

Next actions: take mop, go to kitchen
Turn 26
You are in a broom closet now. There are a broom and a mop. The broom is on the floor. The mop is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.

> take mop

Next actions: go to kitchen, put mop in refrigerator
Turn 27
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.

> put potted plant in hallway

Next actions: take mop, go to kitchen
Turn 28
You are not in a hallway.

> go to hallway

Next actions: take mop, go to kitchen
Turn 29
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a bedroom, a living room, a broom closet and a kitchen here.

> put potted plant in hallway

Next actions: take mop, go to kitchen
Turn 30
Hallway is not a receptacle.

> drop potted plant

Next actions: take mop, go to kitchen
Turn 31
I don't know what 'potted' means.

> drop plant

Next actions: take mop, go to kitchen
Turn 32
I don't know how to interpret this 'drop' action.

> put potted plant on floor

Next actions: take mop, go to kitchen
Turn 33
You can't see a floor here.

> put plant on ground

Next actions: take mop, go to kitchen
Turn 34
I don't know what 'plant' means.

> put potted plant on ground

Next actions: take mop, go to kitchen
Turn 35
I don't know what 'ground' means.

> put potted plant down

Next actions: take mop, go to kitchen
Turn 36
I don't know what 'down' means.

> put potted plant on floor

Next actions: take mop, go to kitchen
Turn 37
You can't see a floor here.

> put potted plant on ground

Next actions: take mop, go to kitchen
Turn 38
I don't know what 'ground' means.

> put potted plant on the ground outside

Next actions: take mop, go to kitchen
Turn 39
I don't know what 'ground outside' means.

> put potted plant on the ground in the hallway

Next actions: take mop, go to kitchen
Turn 40
I don't know what you mean.

> put potted plant on the ground in the hallway

I meant to say that I want to put the potted plant on the ground in the hallway, but since you can't see a floor in the hallway, I should have been more specific. However, I will try again with a different approach.

> go to kitchen

Next actions: take mop, put potted plant in freezer
Turn 41
I don't know what you mean.

> go to kitchen

Next actions: take mop, put potted plant in freezer
Turn 42

Turn 43
